Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with traces of light-brown paint and fainter traces of one line of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394166) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394166)
